name: Loop Guy
description:
Welcome to our LD 47 submission. You play as Frederick, a simple man who had a chiropractor appointment in the morning before going to work. From there Frederick has to live his life and survive all the trials and tribulations it throws at him.

Controls:

  • W - Move forward
  • S - Move backwards
  • A - Lean/turn left
  • D - lean/turn right
  • Q - Extend left hand
  • E - Extend right hand
  • Hold Shift - go faster
  • F - skip text
  • Esc - pause menu
  • Mouse - move camera
